post.body: loved episode 1 of techfluff.tv, regards geoff ;-)
- good work. looking forward to the free co-founders dinner :-) PS: there is an unusual spelling of 'occasional' on your BIO
yeah - very happy - despite some of the bad press he is receiving... fuelled by @mernas ;-)
is tweetdeck better than twhirl?
check out the insightful author of the Undercover Economist, Mr Tim Harford here: http://blogs.ft.com/undercover/
I hope this week is a case of 'Change the world or go home' Have you met Hugh Macleod yet? http://tinyurl.com/5j7k37
@sophiehobson & @emmahaslett: can you prove how much smarta girls are and come up with a new tagline? http://blog.snagsta.com
what a surprise Guiness didn't use your tagline. Such blinkered thinking... you were obviously a wasted talent there!
yeah - but its weird having such a techsavvy hip mom! what next... a twitter account!?
was it the people from UP?
how did you find out about that google job? its my mates old job - he's just been promoted.
would be happy to share the delights of snagsta with you. send me your email & i'll invite to join the private beta
nice to 'meet' you. just read Undercover Econ... busy drinking some overpriced coffee as I type...
that's because your shirts are in a class of their own... really they should be in a closet... on their own.
enjoy yourself... i am sure it'll be better than staying home climbing ladders :-)
www.jingproject.com is by far the best screengrab tool for remote web dev i have used. thanks @chrsoz
Malcolm Gladwell just emailed me to say he'd be happy to put his list of the 10 Secrets of Success on Snagsta...
just been to see Malcolm Gladwell speak with @mernas. What an incredible story teller! And what great hair :-)
need a break from the daily grind? Let your creative juices loose for 5 min. help Snagsta improve their tagline: http://blog.snagsta.com
my latest post - a tagline competition... can we do better than: Snagsta. Helps you find the things Google can't... http://blog.snagsta.com
Midnight in Manila- if i was in the market for fake viagra & ladies with adams apples i'd be in heaven! Hang on... this bar IS called Heaven
Not sure who is in the Mclaren today because i am convinced lewis hamilton is driving me to Shanghai airport...
revved up for my trip to manila to work with snagsta's new developers... but first i have to get through a weekend in shanghai with hamish..
Had to choose between spending time with mark zuckerberg or amelia hofmeyr tonight. I kissed the feet of the person i chose...
wandering through place des vosges - quintessential paris in the sunshine...
is very proud of his mom's first ever blog post: http://awfullybigblogadventure.blogspot.com/
DrinkTank Awards last night: Apparently I am not the hottest web entrepreneur in London. Not even runner up. Must be the gay hair.
http://twitpic.com/tdpz - techcrunch party or building a fort? No contest... Sorry @mbites : -)
